statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: As we all known , the Fibonacci series : F(0) = 1, F(1) = 1, F(N) = F(N - 1) + F(N - 2) (N >= 2).Now we define another kind of Fibonacci : A(0) = 1 , A(1) = 1 , A(N) = X * A(N - 1) + Y * A(N - 2) (N >= 2).And we want to Calculate S(N) , S(N) = A(0)2 +A(1)2+……+A(n)2.

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
There are several test cases.
Each test case will contain three integers , N, X , Y .
N : 2<= N <= 231 – 1
X : 2<= X <= 231– 1
Y : 2<= Y <= 231 – 1

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each test case , output the answer of S(n).If the answer is too big , divide it by 10007 and give me the reminder.
